title: Consultation with Alpaca-san
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Huh, Kotori-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah, Hanayo-chan. Are you taking care of the animals?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah, that’s right. Look look, I got a lot of green grass with the help of Rin-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Waah, that’s amazing. Alpaca-san doesn’t want to eat just pellets, but also fresh grass too huh. Hey, can I help?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Of course~. Thank you, Kotori-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s my pleasure. I’m excited to help♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Speaking of which, Kotori-chan, what are you doing here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Umm, actually, I can’t really solidify the image of the next outfit, so I came to talk with Alpaca-san~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>If you talk with Alpaca-san, you can get your thinking straight….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe, it’s embarrassing, so keep it a secret from everyone okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I got it. But Alpaca-san is really amazing huh. To be able to be Kotori’s consultation partner, there there, good girl<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Good girl, good girl<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>….But I kinda want to become your consultation partner too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu. Then, after you’re done with the animals, would you accompany me to a handicraft store to pick some fabrics?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Sure! I’ll go with you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
